contents: Article 3 (Function) The Committee deliberates and decides on the following matters in order to achieve the purpose of Article 42, Paragraph 1 of the Articles of Incorporation. Revised 2016. 4. 28., 2017. 4. 3., 2019. 1. 31., 2021. 12. 27. 1. In relation to the Olympic Games and various international competitions, cultivating the spirit of fair play and disseminating and disseminating the Olympic spirit 2 Matters pertaining to the protection and promotion of athletes' rights and interests 3. Advice on support for retired athletes 4. Selection and recommendation of athletes member candidates for the International Olympic Committee (hereinafter referred to as *IOC) 5. International Council of Arbitration. for Sport) Presenting opinions to the Sports Council when appointing an arbitrator 6. Matters related to projects to protect and support fair athletes 7. Representatives pursuant to Article 14, Paragraph 1, Item 4 of the Articles of Incorporation and Article 23, Paragraph 2, Item 5 of the Articles of Incorporation Election of athlete representatives as directors 8. Matters related to cooperation with the IOC Athletes' Committee 9. Other matters related to the purpose of establishing the committee
